title: Soviet Russia
description: Transformation of Russian autocracy from tsarist to Bolshevik under the impact of World War I and the Revolution of 1917. The formative force of Marxism-Leninism; Civil War; the 'experimental' 20s; forced collectivization and industrialization; the Purges; 'engineering' a new Soviet Woman and Man for a new communist world; War: Second and Cold. 3 lectures and research project.
